trans-unit.source: Retains data-binding expressions and static literal text.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> class persists the value of its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property to view state.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl"></xref> class.
Defines the size of the array to create for storing static literal strings.
Defines the size of the array to create for storing data-bound literal strings.
Assigns a string value to an array containing data-bound values.
The position in an array at which to retain the s parameter value.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the value for the data-bound expression.
Assigns a string value to an array containing static values.
The position in an array at which to retain the s parameter value.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the value for the data-bound expression.
Gets the text content of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl"></xref> object.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> class persists the value of its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property to view state.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the text content of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl"></xref>.
Gets or sets the text content of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl"></xref> object.
This implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl> interface returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property.
The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property is persisted in the view state.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> object implements <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl> but does not support the `set` method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.ITextControl.Text%2A> property.
All attempts to use this method will return a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the text content of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl"></xref>.
An attempt to set the value is made.
